verses.name: Ezekiel 21:26
verses.text: Thus saith the Lord God; Remove the diadem, and take off the crown: this shall not be the same: exalt him that is low, and abase him that is high.

verses.name: Ezekiel 21:27
verses.text: I will overturn, overturn, overturn, it: and it shall be no more, until he come whose right it is; and I will give it him.

verses.name: Ezekiel 21:28
verses.text: And thou, son of man, prophesy and say, Thus saith the Lord God concerning the Ammonites, and concerning their reproach; even say thou, The sword, the sword is drawn: for the slaughter it is furbished, to consume because of the glittering:
